text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao mnoussa lok teang lay. pit bra dk nasa khnhom kuchea anakneasar robsa a l laoh mk kan puok anak teangoasaknea del amnach krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei chea kamm se ti th robsa trong . kmean te mcheasa del trauv ke korp da pitabrakd krawpi trong del chea anak thveu aoy rsa ning chea anak thveu aoy slab . dau che neah chaur puok anak chue leu a l laoh ning anakneasar robsa trong del chea na pi min cheh an ning min cheh sarser del keat mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning chue krob peakyasaamdei robsa trong . haey chaur puok anak brate b tde tam keat sangkhumtha puok anak nung ttuol ban nouv kar changaoulobangheanh
